title: LoL Detective - Episode 1
body:
http://i.imgur.com/Iv8kx7y.png

**TL; DR: Judge the case below and tell us how you would react if you were in the game! Would you report someone? Mute ? Give some tips? What do you think would be the best way to handle this situation and make our community better?**

Hey everyone,

The idea is to discuss which is the best course of action to take when we find ourselves in a game with a behavior issue and – if necessary - what category of report to use to  precisely identify the negative players.

If you want to remember the categories of report and their descriptions,[ look here](http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-JCwL8706qZk/ViAdgsIzgoI/AAAAAAAAy20/uibMA7oozLo/s1600/n2BJwC2.png)!

Champion Katarina, on Summoners Rift, using Meijai!

Champions involved: Katarina, Zyra and Draven

**Case:** {{champion:55}} built {{item:3041}} even though she was losing the lane and had died a few times.

Evidence:

**[10:14] Draven**: kat

**[10:19] Draven**: why didnt you leave this s%#$ for me?

**[10:23] Draven**: look the item you made

**[10:24] Draven**: askodkoasdkoasokasd

**[10:34] Zyra**: he has no obligation to leave it for you

**[10:37] Zyra**: he didn't leave it because he didnt noticed

**[10:41] Draven**: shut up

**[10:44] Draven**: not talking to you wh*#&

**[10:49] Zyra**: what?

**[10:57] Zyra**: wh*#&? Really?

**[13:45] Draven**: $lut! yeah

**[18:01] [All] Draven**: ggiiziii


As stated above, Draven had the chance to help Katarina, but his frustrations spoke louder. What to do in a case like this?

----------------------------------
Case closed!! Until next time =)

Investigation Summary

Several players shared their opinions on the case. Overall Draven would be denounced by negative attitude or verbal abuse. Some players said they would use "mute" to avoid Draven attacks, which is a good thing and it is even better if you give moral support to the rest of his team not to fall into the negative influence of Draven.


Special thanks to the following summoners for their sharp reasoning and insightful comments:
BigRedNZ
Thane
Jewsus
Deep Terror Nami

> Do you think publicly telling everyone to mute Draven is beneficial for the team overall? (I understand why you would say that and the intentions are great, do you think Draven would get tilted even more?)

Yes, I think it's beneficial and Draven is more likely to calm down than to tilt further from experience. The way it works is that he knows he's not helping, he just doesn't care and can't be bothered to stop himself from venting verbally. If the team can't see what he's saying, he's not being aggravated further by what we may say in response to him, which makes him calm down over time. Of course, this isn't always what happens, but is what usually happens from the many games I've played.

> Do you think option 2. might not be very good though in the sense that draven sounds pretty tilted already?

Option 2 is a mood where I'm just playing for fun with no care about anything, so him tilting more because of it doesn't bother me. I think a good amount of the time it doesn't actually make the situation worse since it shows you're calm and puts influence (regardless of how little) on the other players. Or it could just piss some people off, but usually it seems fine to me.

> What do you think about encouraging Kat, and continuing to play and ignoring Draven?

When you say "ignoring Draven", do you mean muting him without saying anything or leaving him open but just not paying any attention to it? I usually just leave people unmuted and ignore them unless it reaches a point where I realise they're not going to stop and a mute is necessary. In regards to Katarina, encouragement is great and should be done. If she seems upset or handles the situation well then by all means I'll say something nice to her and the rest of the team to try and alleviate some of the stress.

For the past few days I've started trying to be excessively nice while in game to both my team and the enemy to see how people respond and how it influences play. It seems to have been going pretty well, so if people are having issues in that area then I definitely recommend just being as nice as possible, even if it's not sincere. Just as smiling while sad or in pain helps, being extra nice and polite in chat helps with playing better and improving teamwork.

If you don't mind sharing, what do you plan to do with these responses?

Lol Detective episode 2: 

Kat is the victim, and she has all our sympathies, most players will report Draven if they remember post game, and encourage Kat throughout. We are grateful that Zyra was supportive. But then:

Kat and zyra say 'GG ez' when their team loses/wins the game, and suddenly they get reports too (remembering that it is a reportable offence) 
so tell me after saying that simple line 'GG ez' they now receive no less punishment than draven does despite his crime being much worse.

So you as a jury, you have to make a decision, you must now either punish (to the same severity) or forgive all 3 players (they all received valid reports remember) what is your decision?

Easy,
1. Mute draven
2. Tell your team to ignore him
3. Give kat insightful tips on what to do next time she is in the same situation

I'd say something along the lines of "Look, I don't agree with her choice, but let's focus on playing the game, and it may even work in our favour." If Draven continues ranting, I just ignore it and keep going.
Nice and impartial haha

To whoever it may concern,

Draven mindset at that moment- Assuming, from the evidence gathered shows that the (adc) is not having a good game due to the fact that he is not getting kills and probably not enough farm which can be very frustrating and can affect your game badly which can lead you to lose the game due to lack of confidence and faith in the team to carry on with the game.

Katarina mindset at that moment- It is pretty clear that she is having an opportunistic game. The frustration of not being able to get stacks on mejais can be pretty demoralizing and it can cause you to try and kill steal your from your alliance in order to stack up.

Solution-
1.Try to convince the rest of the team
Top lane, jungle and zyra to focus on the game at hand and make best of the situation as much as possible, which is to help katarina get stacks because from my experience she can snow ball the enemy early game and although she has deaths, she seems to have the basic idea of what the item can do for her. 

2.**If the above does not work out **
Try to assemble the team to help draven because clearly he needs the most attention and seems to be the lowest on confidence, As we all know draven can snowball the enemy late game.

3.**This option is if both draven and katarina fail to co-operate as a team.**
Try to use the opportunity created by your teammates mistakes into your advantage by using your teammates as bait (this will apply in certain situations)
It is basically a 3 v 5 situation but your team members are not afk therefore it is very plausible to make this game go in your favor by making adjustments to your build to help you deal more damage.
  
Abuse is part of the game and is understandable to a certain extent but not continuous abuse, if it is continuous the best option is to mute the player and carry on with the game, However if the abuse carry's on after the game has ended the report is justified and should be reported for negative attitude and hate speech.

4. **This option is applicable after the game is over and i have done this myself and was in a similar situation.**
After the game was ended i asked the person in my team if he would like to play with me and promised him a win in the next game if he declined to play with me as an incentive.

Reason being it is always good to improve a persons skill and knowledge cap where it is lacking so that person may do the same thing for another person. We won the next game and he thanked me for my support and help.

5. There are some people who are beyond help and intentionally throw games for fun or for reasons beyond my understanding, if you want to avoid being in the same game as these people you played last game then wait for at least 20-25 min for your next game or use oce.gg.op to search the username and check if he is in another game.( i have banned 9 people like this in 1 month for various other reasons)

Extras-
These are the options that i know of and would apply if need be. I have been gifted 2 skins because i help people improve and win games. My skill cap is not high at all, neither my knowledge of the game however i do what i can to help others wherever and whenever possible. 

Bonus Clip - Never give up!!!
